select distinct * from (select note.* from note,tag,tag_note where #{tag1}=tag.tag_name and tag.tag_id=tag_note.tag_id and tag_note.note_id=note.noteid) t1 INNER JOIN (select note.* from note,tag,tag_note where #{tag2}=tag.tag_name and tag.tag_id=tag_note.tag_id and tag_note.note_id=note.noteid) t2 using(noteid)

select distinct * from (select note.* from note,tag,tag_note where #{tag1}=tag.tag_name and tag.tag_id=tag_note.tag_id and tag_note.note_id=note.noteid) t1 INNER JOIN (select note.* from note,tag,tag_note where #{tag2}=tag.tag_name and tag.tag_id=tag_note.tag_id and tag_note.note_id=note.noteid) t2 inner join (select note.* from note,tag,tag_note where #{tag3}=tag.tag_name and tag.tag_id=tag_note.tag_id and tag_note.note_id=note.noteid) t3 on t1.noteid=t2.noteid and t2.noteid=t3.noteid
